name: Wappy Santa
description:
I am pleased to share my first public game!

This is a short christmas themed adaptation of the beloved Flappy Bird. The aim of the game is simple, you are Santa and Christmas needs saving!

Fly through the sky collecting the lost presents. Don't get hit by coal...

Credits to Music Artists:

Carol Of The Bells – D.Mave Trap Remix
Dance Of The Sugar Plum Fair – JeyKode Trap Remix
Feliz Navidad – Impozible Remix
Jingle Bell Rock – A Trappy Christmas Remix
Last Christmas – Sambrosa Trap Remix
Let It Snow! Let It Snow! – Larry Ohh Trap Remix
Loud – Ding Dong On Christmas
Ronettes - Sleigh Bells PhatCap! Trap Remix
Rudolph The Red Nosed Reindeer – CSMS Trap Remix
Santa Claus Is Coming To Town – Bern-AT Warlex Remix
